text:
*[Bug 18910] tcl license*
<https://bugs.r-project.org/show_bug.cgi?id=18910>

--- Comment #2 from Eric Lindblad (<mailto:lindblad@gmx.com|lindblad@gmx.com>) ---
`src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd`

I mentioned two URLs and it may be more comprehensive to include the other one
here.

I don't know if that is something for consideration or if the comment appearing
at the top of other .Rd files is standardised, and therefore not to be deviated
from. 

```
diff -Naur a/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd
b/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd
--- a/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd    2025-06-13 18:34:32.339053797
-0500
+++ b/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd    2025-07-09 11:30:15.445210696
-0500
@@ -2,6 +2,8 @@
 % Part of the R package, <https://www.R-project.org>
 % Copyright 1995-2014 R Core Team
 % Distributed under GPL 2 or later
+% The files in exec may be subject to "license.terms"
+% <https://www.tcl-lang.org/software/tcltk/license.html>

 \name{tcltk-package}
 \alias{tcltk-package}
```

elements.text:
I mentioned two URLs and it may be more comprehensive to include the other one
here.

I don't know if that is something for consideration or if the comment appearing
at the top of other .Rd files is standardised, and therefore not to be deviated
from.

diff -Naur a/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd
b/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd
--- a/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd    2025-06-13 18:34:32.339053797
-0500
+++ b/src/library/tcltk/man/tcltk-package.Rd    2025-07-09 11:30:15.445210696
-0500
@@ -2,6 +2,8 @@

% Copyright 1995-2014 R Core Team

+% The files in exec may be subject to "license.terms"
+%
